title: yourchainhollow
author: yourchainhollow
content: Selling an Industry Pass for the 2023 Bitcoin conference Taking place in Miami. Unfortunately I will not be able to attend due to personal reasons. The ticket is currently going for $1,150 And it is currently listed on Tixel. Access to All 3 Days of Bitcoin 2023Exclusive access to Industry DayAccess to Investor and Founders at Pitch DayExclusive access to Official Networking AppExclusive access to Official Networking LoungeExclusive access to Cleanspark Mining LoungeAccess to official Industry Press conferenceComplimentary coffee in loungesDedicated Networking BadgesFREE 2 month Bitcoin Magazine Pro SubscriptionPriority Registration for Industry Pass HoldersTicket link: https://tixel.com/u/kelvinj2
